alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 8:02PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...LIGHT ICE ACCUMULATIONS POSSIBLE... .A winter weather system will skirt the northern and eastern portions of the area tonight into Saturday morning, bringing some light ice accumulations to the area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Mellette County, Todd County and Tripp County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
